Tech earnings and Nvidia AI server slowdown add equity volatility. Potential Fed independence risk adds currency and credit risk.

article_node.title: Cook Files Lawsuit, Nvidia's Earnings Letdown
article_node.summary: Lisa Cook has filed a lawsuit against President Trump after his attempt to remove her from the Federal Reserve, raising concerns about Fed independence and potential market volatility. The episode also covers Nvidia’s disappointing earnings, with weaker AI server sales prompting a sharp stock decline, and touches on other corporate developments such as Kraft Heinz restructuring plans. Market sentiment remains negative, with tech shares falling and broader indices in the red amid ongoing uncertainty over monetary policy and political interference.
